archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0867
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Revenue Assurance Analyst, I want be able to determine all of our network customers from service and usage records from the network so that we can ensure all of our customers are being billed and rated correctly

properties.value: Reted CDRs feed from Comarch is needed. Needs to include customer identification.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
